title: How to give exceptional customer service. Vol. 2
brief_description: This customer service training seminar focuses on the service representative- you! It looks at how your skills, attitudes and your follow through influence the transaction. Learn how to get into the exceptional customer service mindset, start building core communication skills such as building rapport and establishing trust, controlling the tone of your voice, using proper body language, listening carefully and also discover high-impact techniques for serving customers over the telephone. Using lively demonstrations of how and how not to serve a customer you’ll remember more because you’ll see exceptional customer service in action!
